title: Are there any Eastern European American cowboy movies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Several. Eastern European “Red Western”-s even have a Wikipedia page: Ostern - Wikipedia which have links to the most important ones. Gojko Mitić - Wikipedia was our favorite “Native American”, he was really great in these roles, like for example Winnetou - Wikipedia - based on Karl May - Wikipedia novels (in these movies Native Americans were the heroes). A scene from a Hungarian “Eastern”, the Talpuk alatt füttyül a szél - The Wind Is Whistling Under Their Feet - it is not really a Western with cowboys, but set in the Hungarian puszta which was rather similar to the American Wild West with all the betyárs and horses and cattles and sherriffs (in Hungary similar guys were called zsandár-s).
